component.name: tinyMediaManager
component.summary: A media management tool for organizing movies and TV shows

description.p: tinyMediaManager is a media management tool built with Java and Swing, designed to provide metadata for media centers like Kodi (formerly XBMC), Emby, Jellyfin, and Plex. It helps users organize their movie and TV show collections by fetching metadata, artwork, and other relevant information from various online sources.

ul.li: Automatic metadata fetching from various sources (The Movie Database, The TV Database, and more)
Movie and TV show management with detailed information, posters, backdrops, and artwork
Bulk editing capabilities for efficient batch operations
Support for multiple media center formats and standards
Customizable metadata fields and renaming patterns
Media library organization and cleanup tools
Regular updates with new features and source integrations
